name: GAWNE AVIATION PTY. LTD.
about: Gawne Aviation Pty. Ltd., established in 1977, is a renowned flying school based at Shepparton Airport in Victoria, Australia. As a Registered Training Organization (RTO) since 2003, it offers a comprehensive range of training courses, including Private Pilot Licence, Commercial Pilot Licence, Instructor Ratings, and Multi-Engine Ratings. With highly experienced instructors, many of whom have airline experience, Gawne Aviation provides professional and mature training. The school operates a diverse fleet, including the Air Tourer, Cessna Aerobat, and Piper Warrior, and utilizes a Redbird Flight Simulator. Known for its excellent weather conditions and simple airspace, Gawne Aviation has a long history of training pilots for global airlines, with no contracts or upfront fees required. Our graduates have gone on to fly worldwide, reflecting our commitment to delivering high-quality training that sets students up for success in the aviation industry.
services:
["Old Plane VET-In-Schools Training
RPL - Recreational Pilots License
PPL - Private Pilots License
CPL - Commercial Pilot's License
MER - Multi Engine Rating
FIR - Instructor ratings and upgrades
PMI - Principles & methods of 
ME-CIR - Multi Engine Command Instrument Rating
DFE - Design Feature Endorsement"]
